pages.text: $(italic)Every now and then you are lucky enough to have an enemy leave behind a single rare item.$(br)The connection to luck of $(l:resources/clover)Clover$(/l) and $(l:general/pigment)Light Blue Pigment$(/l) you can increase those chances dramatically.
$(br3)Higher chance to get rare loot drops, like Iron Ingots from Zombies.$(br2)Max Level: 3$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.
